channel.title: Manifesto Company on The Kade Collective
channel.description: Recent content in Manifesto Company on The Kade Collective

item.title: Collective Assets
item.description: Purpose of this page: to outline the key assets that all members of the Kade Collective have at their disposal.

item.title: Frat House
item.description: Purpose of this page: this page describes how the incubator works. TL;DR: Kade will incubate other companies in exchange for 10% equity. Kade will provide seed capital, expertise, and access to all collective assets.

item.title: Profit Sharing
item.description: Purpose of this page: this page describes how full time employees are compensated once they become part of the Kade Collective.

item.title: Retirement Fund
item.description: Purpose of this page: this page describes profits are invested into a Retirement fund. Partners earn shares in this fund each month. 5% of monthly profit is automatically invested into Exchange Traded Funds. Partners vest shares in this fund every month.
